snippet.title: Mushishi ~Amakudari Sato~ Nintendo DS Trailer
snippet.description:
For those of you who are yearning for some more Mushishi and don't want to watch the anime anymore, then do I have the game for you; that is if you can read Japanese, and own a DS. The above video is a brief sample of game play you will experience while playing this game, but that is only if you can consider clicking through text game play. So far this game appears to be a point-and-click adventure game with added mini-games to spice it up a little bit.

This game might not be for everyone, but I wouldn't expect a Mushishi game to be anything other than this. So far there hasn't been any news about an English version, but who knows, the game is still young at this point. 

You can find out more information at www.Japanator.com
